name: EQ Works
description:
We provide a smarter way to target customers and reach your audience. We find where your next customers are, deliver your message and produce results. We do this by using the most efficient advertising platforms that run on powerful data and real-time analytics. We engage your customers by designing and building innovative and compelling mobile and web applications. We do everything in a way that enhances your brand.
We make the smartest decisions for your brand advertising campaigns and marketing initiatives.  We work with advertising agencies of all sizes to deliver the best results for their clients'​ advertising campaigns. Our real-time targeting platform, incorporates the most sophisticated advertising technologies, data analytics and programmatic buying capabilities onto a single system. Your mobile, web, social and video advertising campaigns are fully optimized to ensure your advertising works for you. You set the goals and we make it happen. 
 
READ MORE...
